heading: HR01142
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES THROUGH THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, TO TAKE FURTHER  STEPS AND PERSEVERE IN ITS DIPLOMATIC EFFORTS TO RECOVER THE THREE (3) BELLS OF BALANGIGA FROM THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
status: Pending with the Committee on FOREIGN AFFAIRS since 2017-07-31
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01142
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES THROUGH THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS, TO TAKE FURTHER STEPS AND PERSEVERE IN ITS DIPLOMATIC EFFORTS TO RECOVER THE THREE (3) BELLS OF BALANGIGA FROM THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : EVARDONE, BEN P.
DATE FILED : 2017-07-25
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
